name: Perfect Facebook (please, read the description)
description: A beautyful Facebook to put Wallpapers on it. It also works on mobiles. You have to use it with the Chrome extension "Fabulous for Facebook" or else you wont enjoy the style at all. Extension here: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/facebook-theme-creator/cahdligmofchhjkbjbpcgalhaoioimpb
